overview: Following in the footsteps of her dearly departed mother, Maxie falls further into the passionately intense world of a dominatrix. Although she is defiant of the lifestyle, Aunt Teague continues to break her stubborn will with mistresses who demand nothing but virginal submissiveness. Only then can Maxie retrace the path of her mother's secret sexual explorations and fully submit her body and soul to the kinky Doms assigned to her.
title: Against Her Will 2
